definitions.title: vb.quadril.
definitions.body: amaze, startle (cf. Syr. Palp. lahleh confudit, obstupefecit; Ethpalp. stupore percussus est; luwhloho0 consternatio, all in Lexx., PS:1894)—

definitions.title: Hithpalp.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מִתְלַהְלֵהַּ]] as subst. = madman, sq. [[הַיּׁרֶה זִקִים]] Pr 26:18 (v. Now).
